page.title: 08Walberton_Avisford Pk Hotel
page.content: There are two large country houses in the village. One is Walberton House in the centre; recognised as being the "squire's" house it has recently been turned into flats. Two recent owners are Graham Eyre Q.C. and Lord Woolton. The other house is now Avisford Park Hotel a three star hotel very busy with business men and popular for functions such as weddings and dinners. It has only been a hotel for less than ten years, before that it was a boarding school. Originally it was a large country house in a park much of which is now the hotel golf course. A few years ago it housed a round of the TV international programme "Jeux San Frontieres".
